item.title: Study Notes 1: A bird's-eye view of a Kubernetes cluster
item.author: Luís Franco
item.description: I’ve been meaning to do this for a while now. I’ve studied quite a Kubernetes in the past year and have a ton of handwritten notes that I want to throw away, so I’m transfering all of those notes into my blog. This is also a great review opportunity (and also has the added advantage that I will stop needing to comb through endless sheets of paper when I want to remember something).
